LanguageData.Innocent.degreeDatas.0.label: innocence
LanguageData.Innocent.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s heart has innocence. Maybe it's because you've never experienced a tough world before. [PAWN_pronoun] will be more traumatized by violent acts such as cannibalism, organ harvesting and sight of dead bodies.
LanguageData.Newtype.degreeDatas.0.label: new type
LanguageData.Newtype.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} awakened with a new type. {PAWN_pronoun} is amazing at dodging, and get +5 points for melee and shooting.
